p: During pepsin and pancreatic digestion, aliquots (1 mL) withdrawn after 30 and 120 min to which 1 mL ethanol was added (1:1) to arrest any further enzymatic reaction. Thereafter, samples were centrifuged at 1000 rpm for 5 min. Supernatants (gastrointestinal digested extracts) and pellets were separated and kept at −20 °C for further analysis.
